properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, COUNT FROM TB_NOTICE_BOARD JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE TB_NOTICE_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
UPDATE TB_NOTICE_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, COUNT, MEMBER_NAME FROM TB_NOTICE_BOARD JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE TB_NOTICE_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_NOTICE_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE_BOARD ( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_WRITER, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ.NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ? )
